## ArccosineHNode class

Computes the inverse hyperbolic cosine function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ArccosineHNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns acosh(x) = ln(x + sqrt(x^2 - 1)) for x &gt;<!-- -->= 1 Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
